title: Ep. - 318 - LEVA BONAPARTE FROM SOUTHERN CHARM WHITE COLLAR CRIME ATTORNEY ON GIRARDI CASE
description:
Keri Curtis Axel is a partner in the Los Angeles office of Baker Marquart LLP. She is an experienced trial and appellate lawyer who practices white-collar criminal and government enforcement defense, as well as complex civil litigation. She provides insight on the Girardi case.

 

Leva Bonaparte from Bravo’s Southern Charm talks about joining the show this season, her life before TV, and funny stories about cast members who frequent her bars.  

 

 


Reality Life with Kate Casey

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey

Instagram: @katecaseyca
